summary: there are six known species of HCoV: HCoV-229E, HCoV-NL63, HCoV-HKU1, HCoV-OC43, MERS-CoV and SARS-HCoV. studies have shown evidence of global distribution of HCoVs, but there is limited information on their presence and distribution in Kenya. yearly variations in the prevalence and circulation patterns of individual HCoVs in Kenya. this paper reports on the first molecular characterization of human Coronaviruses.
